header.title: Simple, transparent pricing

promotion.title: Early Access: Pro features FREE!
promotion.description: Sign up now and enjoy Pro features at no cost during our launch period

pro_plus.name: Pro+
pro_plus.description: For growing teams with higher needs

specview.question: What is a SpecView?
specview.answer: SpecView is an AI-generated specification document that organizes your test cases into domains, features, and behaviors. It helps you understand your test coverage at a glance.

analysis.question: What is Analysis?
analysis.answer: Analysis parses your repository's test files and extracts test cases, frameworks, and statistics. It's the foundation for understanding your test suite.

promotionFree.question: Is the promotion really free?
promotionFree.answer: Yes! During our early access period, you get Pro-level features at no cost. No credit card required. When we introduce paid plans, you'll be notified in advance.

paymentLive.question: When will payments go live?
paymentLive.answer: We're currently in early access. Paid plans will be introduced later this year. Early users will receive special benefits and advance notice.

retention.question: What is data retention?
retention.answer: Data retention refers to how long we store your analysis history and generated documents. Higher plans offer longer retention periods.
